How many people are affected by Diamond-Blackfan anemia ?,Diamond-Blackfan anemia affects approximately 5 to 7 per million liveborn infants worldwide.,GHR,Diamond-Blackfan anemia
What are the genetic changes related to Diamond-Blackfan anemia ?,"Diamond-Blackfan anemia can be caused by mutations in the RPL5, RPL11, RPL35A, RPS7, RPS10, RPS17, RPS19, RPS24, and RPS26 genes. These genes provide instructions for mak
